title: 43 minute game. Number of Wards placed by people that were not me: 21
body:
Riven with Unupgraded Warding Totem: 8
Malzahar with Unupgraded Warding Totem: 6
Elise with Sweeper: 5 (Had warding totem until 17:25 never bought a ward otherwise)
Jinx with Scrying Orb: 2 (Had warding totem until 40:01)

We still won but COME ON ALREADY.

TWO. TWO wards in a 43 minute game WITH the Warding Totem for all but the last 3 minutes?
